entry.title: Hello Internet!
entry.content:
I love programing because it is creative, because it is challenging, and because it gives you the power to concretize.

What follows are my (hopefully) helpful musings on different web technologies, implementations, and anything else I come across or create that seems interesting enough to warrant being written about.
entry.summary:
I love programing because it is creative, because it is challenging, and because it gives you the power to concretize.
